summary: Completed comprehensive testing of production-grade Admin + Client portals with API wiring fixes, environment config, and portal routing. All backend APIs are fully functional. Frontend components work with minor session management issues.

integration_issues.issue: Session timeout causing logout when navigating between portal pages

passed_tests: Admin login with admin/admin123 - works with missing .env fallback
Safe fallback to localhost:8001 when .env is missing
System API Access page loads at /admin/system/api-access
BottomNav shows all 5 tabs: Home, Wallet, History, Referrals, Rewards
Portal Dashboard loads correctly with balance and referral info
All 14 backend API endpoints working (100% pass rate)
Admin system API keys CRUD operations
Portal wallet breakdown API with 3 tabs structure
Enhanced transactions API for portal history
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider increasing JWT token expiration time or implementing token refresh mechanism to prevent session timeouts during portal navigation. All core functionality is working correctly.
